answerText: operational amplifiers [or op-amps; prompt on "amplifiers"][10] Op-amps also involve this kind of coupling, meaning electrical energy is transferred via physical conduction. This term also names a kind of flow of electric charge that is often contrasted with alternating current.

subject: Science
question: Question: The two golden rules of these devices summarize the characteristics of their ideal types, and they have two inputs and one output. For 10 points each: [10] Name these very high-gain electronic devices whose ideal versions have infinite gain, infinite input impedance, zero out impedance, infinite bandwidth, and zero input offset voltage.
